mapper.sql: USER_ID, USER_CODE, USER_NAME, USER_EN_NAME,IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER, PHONE, EMAIL, USER_TYPE, DRIVER_TYPE, QQ, WECHAT, SEX, BIRTHDAY, NATION, EDUCATION, REMARK, AVATRAR, PHOTO_PATH, BINDING_PHONE, DEPT_ID, POSITION_ID, JOIN_DATE, RESIGNATION_DATE, BILL_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG, ADMIN, SUPER_MANAGER

user.USER_ID, user.USER_CODE, user.USER_NAME, user.USER_EN_NAME, user.IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER,user.PHONE, user.EMAIL, user.USER_TYPE, user.DRIVER_TYPE, login.IP,login.BLOCK,login.ERROR_TIMES,login.RECENTLY_LOGINTIME, user.QQ, user.WECHAT, user.SEX, user.BIRTHDAY, user.NATION, user.EDUCATION, user.REMARK, user.AVATRAR, user.PHOTO_PATH, user.BINDING_PHONE, user.DEPT_ID, user.POSITION_ID, user.JOIN_DATE, user.RESIGNATION_DATE, user.BILL_STATUS, user.CREATOR, creator.USER_NAME as CREATE_NAME,user.CREATE_DATE, user.CHECKER,checker.USER_NAME as CHECKER_NAME,user.CHECK_DATE, user.CORP_ID, position.POSITION_NAME,dept.DEPT_NAME,corp.CORP_NAME,user.FLAG, user.ADMIN, user.SUPER_MANAGER

where user.del = 0 and user.USER_ID = #{userId} and user.ADMIN = #{admin} and user.SUPER_MANAGER = #{superManager} and (user.USER_CODE = #{userCode} or user.USER_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{userCode}),'%')) and ( user.USER_NAME = #{userName} or user.USER_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{userName}),'%') ) and ( user.USER_EN_NAME = #{userEnName} or user.USER_EN_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{userEnName}),'%') ) and (user.IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER = #{identityCardNumber} or user.IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER like concat(concat('%',#{identityCardNumber}),'%') ) and (user.PHONE = #{phone} or user.PHONE like concat(concat('%',#{phone}),'%') ) and user.EMAIL = #{email} and user.USER_TYPE = #{userType} and user.DRIVER_TYPE = #{driverType} and user.QQ = #{qq} and user.WECHAT = #{wechat} and user.SEX = #{sex} and user.BIRTHDAY = #{birthday} and user.NATION = #{nation} and user.EDUCATION = #{education} and user.REMARK = #{remark} and user.AVATRAR = #{avatrar} and user.PHOTO_PATH = #{photoPath} and user.BINDING_PHONE = #{bindingPhone} and user.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} and user.POSITION_ID = #{positionId} and ( user.JOIN_DATE = #{joinDate} or user.JOIN_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{joinDate}),'%') ) and ( user.RESIGNATION_DATE = #{resignationDate} or user.RESIGNATION_DATE like concat(concat('%',#{joinDate}),'%') ) and user.BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus} and user.CREATOR = #{creator} and user.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} and user.CHECKER = #{checker} and user.CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate} and user.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and user.FLAG = #{flag} and ( user.USER_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{refUserCode}),'%')) and ( user.USER_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{refUserName}),'%') ) and ( user.USER_EN_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{refUserEnName}),'%') ) and ( user.PHONE like concat(concat('%',#{refPhone}),'%') ) and (user.USER_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{searchContent}),'%') or user.USER_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{searchContent}),'%') or user.PHONE like concat(concat('%',#{searchContent}),'%') ) and user.CREATE_DATE >= #{startTime} and user.CREATE_DATE <= #{endTime}
mapper.select: select FROM bd_user user left JOIN sys_corp corp ON corp.CORP_ID = user.CORP_ID left JOIN bd_user creator ON creator.USER_ID = user.creator left JOIN bd_user checker ON checker.USER_ID = user.checker left join BD_DEPT dept ON dept.DEPT_ID = user.DEPT_ID left join bd_position position ON position.position_id = user.position_id left join bd_login login ON login.USER_ID = user.USER_ID where user.del = 0 and user.USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into bd_user (USER_CODE, USER_NAME, USER_EN_NAME,IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER, PHONE, EMAIL, USER_TYPE, DRIVER_TYPE, QQ, WECHAT, SEX, BIRTHDAY, NATION, EDUCATION, REMARK, AVATRAR, PHOTO_PATH, BINDING_PHONE, DEPT_ID, POSITION_ID, JOIN_DATE, RESIGNATION_DATE, BILL_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG, ADMIN, SUPER_MANAGER) values (#{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{identityCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{driverType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatrar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bindingPhone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{positionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{joinDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{resignationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{admin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{superManager,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into bd_user USER_CODE, USER_NAME, USER_EN_NAME, IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER, PHONE, EMAIL, USER_TYPE, DRIVER_TYPE, QQ, WECHAT, SEX, BIRTHDAY, NATION, EDUCATION, REMARK, AVATRAR, PHOTO_PATH, BINDING_PHONE, DEPT_ID, POSITION_ID, JOIN_DATE, RESIGNATION_DATE, BILL_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, CHECKER, CHECK_DATE, CORP_ID, FLAG, ADMIN, SUPER_MANAGER, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{driverType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatrar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bindingPhone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{positionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{joinDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{resignationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{admin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{superManager,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update bd_user USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_EN_NAME = #{userEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER = #{identityCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DRIVER_TYPE = #{driverType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WECHAT = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, NATION = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDUCATION = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AVATRAR = #{avatrar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHOTO_PATH = #{photoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BINDING_PHONE = #{bindingPhone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, POSITION_ID = #{positionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, JOIN_DATE = #{joinDate,jdbcType=DATE}, RESIGNATION_DATE = #{resignationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ADMIN = #{admin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUPER_MANAGER = #{superManager,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update bd_user set USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_EN_NAME = #{userEnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER = #{identityCardNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DRIVER_TYPE = #{driverType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, QQ = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WECHAT = #{wechat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, NATION = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDUCATION = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AVATRAR = #{avatrar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHOTO_PATH = #{photoPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BINDING_PHONE = #{bindingPhone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, POSITION_ID = #{positionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, JOIN_DATE = #{joinDate,jdbcType=DATE}, RESIGNATION_DATE = #{resignationDate,jdbcType=DATE}, BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ADMIN = #{admin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUPER_MANAGER = #{superManager,jdbcType=INTEGER} where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update bd_user BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHECKER = #{checker,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update bd_user set DEL = 1 WHERE USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update BD_USER set DEL = 1 WHERE USER_ID in #{item,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select FROM bd_USER user left JOIN sys_corp corp ON corp.CORP_ID = user.CORP_ID left JOIN bd_user creator ON creator.USER_ID = user.creator left JOIN bd_user checker ON checker.USER_ID = user.checker left join BD_DEPT dept ON dept.DEPT_ID = user.DEPT_ID left join bd_position position ON position.position_id = user.position_id left join bd_login login on login.USER_ID = user.USER_ID AND user.BILL_STATUS=1 order by ${orderByClause}

select FROM bd_USER user left JOIN sys_corp corp ON corp.CORP_ID = user.CORP_ID left JOIN bd_user creator ON creator.USER_ID = user.creator left JOIN bd_user checker ON checker.USER_ID = user.checker left join BD_DEPT dept ON dept.DEPT_ID = user.DEPT_ID left join bd_position position ON position.position_id = user.position_id left join bd_login login on login.USER_ID = user.USER_ID ORDER BY user.CREATE_DATE DESC

select FROM bd_user user JOIN sys_corp corp ON corp.CORP_ID = user.CORP_ID JOIN bd_user creator ON creator.USER_ID = user.creator left JOIN bd_user checker ON checker.USER_ID = user.checker left join BD_DEPT dept ON dept.DEPT_ID = user.DEPT_ID left join bd_position position ON position.position_id = user.position_id where user.CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by ${orderByClause}

select FROM bd_user user JOIN sys_corp corp ON corp.CORP_ID = user.CORP_ID JOIN bd_user creator ON creator.USER_ID = user.creator left JOIN bd_user checker ON checker.USER_ID = user.checker left join BD_DEPT dept ON dept.DEPT_ID = user.DEPT_ID left join bd_position position ON position.position_id = user.position_id left join bd_login login ON login.USER_ID = user.USER_ID where user.DEL=0 AND user.PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and user.user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER} and user.BILL_STATUS=1

select FROM bd_user user JOIN sys_corp corp ON corp.CORP_ID = user.CORP_ID JOIN bd_user creator ON creator.USER_ID = user.creator left JOIN bd_user checker ON checker.USER_ID = user.checker left join BD_DEPT dept ON dept.DEPT_ID = user.DEPT_ID left join bd_position position ON position.position_id = user.position_id left join bd_login login ON login.USER_ID = user.USER_ID where user.DEL = 1 AND user.PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and user.user_type = #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: user.USER_ID, user.USER_CODE, user.USER_NAME, user.USER_EN_NAME,user.IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER, user.PHONE, user.EMAIL,user.USER_TYPE,user.DRIVER_TYPE, applogin.IP,login.BLOCK,login.ERROR_TIMES,applogin.RECENTLY_LOGINTIME, user.QQ, user.WECHAT, user.SEX, user.BIRTHDAY, user.NATION, user.EDUCATION, user.REMARK, user.AVATRAR, user.PHOTO_PATH, user.BINDING_PHONE, user.DEPT_ID, user.POSITION_ID, user.JOIN_DATE, user.RESIGNATION_DATE, user.BILL_STATUS, user.CREATOR, creator.USER_NAME as CREATE_NAME,user.CREATE_DATE, user.CHECKER,checker.USER_NAME as CHECKER_NAME,user.CHECK_DATE, user.CORP_ID, position.POSITION_NAME,dept.DEPT_NAME,corp.CORP_NAME,user.FLAG
mapper.select: select FROM bd_USER user JOIN sys_corp corp ON corp.CORP_ID = user.CORP_ID JOIN bd_user creator ON creator.USER_ID = user.creator left JOIN bd_user checker ON checker.USER_ID = user.checker left join BD_DEPT dept ON dept.DEPT_ID = user.DEPT_ID left join bd_position position ON position.position_id = user.position_id left join bd_login login on login.USER_ID = user.USER_ID left join bd_app_login applogin on applogin.USER_ID = user.USER_ID where user.del = 0 and user.USER_TYPE=1 and user.USER_ID = #{userId} and (user.USER_CODE = #{userCode} or user.USER_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{userCode}),'%')) and (user.USER_NAME = #{userName} or user.USER_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{userName}),'%') ) and (user.IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER = #{identityCardNumber} or user.IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER like concat(concat('%',#{identityCardNumber}),'%') ) and user.USER_EN_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{userEnName}),'%') and user.PHONE like concat(concat('%',#{phone}),'%') and user.EMAIL = #{email} and user.DRIVER_TYPE = #{driverType} and user.QQ = #{qq} and user.WECHAT = #{wechat} and user.SEX = #{sex} and user.BIRTHDAY = #{birthday} and user.NATION = #{nation} and user.EDUCATION = #{education} and user.REMARK = #{remark} and user.AVATRAR = #{avatrar} and user.PHOTO_PATH = #{photoPath} and user.BINDING_PHONE = #{bindingPhone} and user.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} and user.POSITION_ID = #{positionId} and user.JOIN_DATE = #{joinDate} and user.RESIGNATION_DATE = #{resignationDate} and user.BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus} and user.CREATOR = #{creator} and user.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} and user.CHECKER = #{checker} and user.CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate} and user.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and corp.CORP_NAME = #{refCorpName} and user.FLAG = #{flag} and (user.IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER like concat(concat('%',#{searchContent}),'%') or user.USER_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{searchContent}),'%') or user.PHONE like concat(concat('%',#{searchContent}),'%') ) and user.CREATE_DATE >= #{startTime} and user.CREATE_DATE <= #{endTime} ORDER BY user.CREATE_DATE DESC

select FROM bd_USER user JOIN sys_corp corp ON corp.CORP_ID = user.CORP_ID JOIN bd_user creator ON creator.USER_ID = user.creator left JOIN bd_user checker ON checker.USER_ID = user.checker left join BD_DEPT dept ON dept.DEPT_ID = user.DEPT_ID left join bd_position position ON position.position_id = user.position_id left join bd_login login on login.USER_ID = user.USER_ID where user.DEL=0 AND user.USER_TYPE=1 AND user.USER_ID=#{driverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select FROM bd_USER user JOIN sys_corp corp ON corp.CORP_ID = user.CORP_ID JOIN bd_user creator ON creator.USER_ID = user.creator left JOIN bd_user checker ON checker.USER_ID = user.checker left join BD_DEPT dept ON dept.DEPT_ID = user.DEPT_ID left join bd_position position ON position.position_id = user.position_id left join bd_login login on login.USER_ID = user.USER_ID where user.DEL=0 AND user.USER_TYPE=1 AND user.BILL_STATUS=1 and user.USER_ID = #{userId} and (user.USER_CODE = #{userCode} or user.USER_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{userCode}),'%')) and (user.USER_NAME = #{userName} or user.USER_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{userName}),'%')) and user.USER_EN_NAME = #{userEnName} and user.IDENTITY_CARD_NUMBER = #{identityCardNumber} and user.PHONE = #{phone} and user.EMAIL = #{email} and user.DRIVER_TYPE = #{driverType} and user.QQ = #{qq} and user.WECHAT = #{wechat} and user.SEX = #{sex} and user.BIRTHDAY = #{birthday} and user.NATION = #{nation} and user.EDUCATION = #{education} and user.REMARK = #{remark} and user.AVATRAR = #{avatrar} and user.PHOTO_PATH = #{photoPath} and user.BINDING_PHONE = #{bindingPhone} and user.DEPT_ID = #{deptId} and user.POSITION_ID = #{positionId} and user.JOIN_DATE = #{joinDate} and user.RESIGNATION_DATE = #{resignationDate} and user.BILL_STATUS = #{billStatus} and user.CREATOR = #{creator} and user.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} and user.CHECKER = #{checker} and user.CHECK_DATE = #{checkDate} and user.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and user.FLAG = #{flag} and (user.USER_CODE like concat(concat('%',#{searchContent}),'%') or user.USER_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{searchContent}),'%')) and user.CREATE_DATE >= #{startTime} and user.CREATE_DATE <= #{endTime}
